All geeky ways will lead you to a big kersh

kersh the most annoying feature which comes with most of developers :/
Kersh is a Senority Sign :D http://www.producthunt.com/brianmwang/collections/health-fitness-in-2015
Mohamed Alaa El Din looooool :D

The hacker's diet! Quoting the wikipedia page :

"Walker describes the diet as approaching weight loss "as an engineering problem",[2]  claiming that his approach enabled him to reduce his weight from 215 
pounds to 145 pounds in a year, and keep it stable afterwards.[3]
Walker considers the problem of weight loss and maintenance as a control system
 problem. Simplifying the problem to the barest elements, he models the 
human body as a "rubber bag," where variables such as food type, 
frequency, metabolic rates and even exercise as considered negligible. 
According to Walker, the difference between calorie intake and 
expenditure is the key (a calorie surplus leads to weight gain; a 
calorie deficit leads to weight loss). To solve the problem, one needs 
to monitor calorie intake and weight loss rate, and make the desired 
proportional adjustments to reach the desired goal.[4]"

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Hacker%27s_Diet

And remember, science says diet is wrong!

http://www.ted.com/talks/sandra_aamodt_why_dieting_doesn_t_usually_work
